text: Hey <@U06CSF89X41>, you have a revision option in the design manager. Just right-click on your file and select "show revision history". Select your desired revision, roll back to it, hit "update" in the file and fetch it

Hi dear HubSpot Developer community!

For a client, I'm trying to setup a custom quote template. I cloned the HubSpot cms-quote-theme and made my own version of the cms template modern.html (I added a rich text module and pagebreak at the bottom of the quote to add terms & conditions).

I am struggling with the font color of the header section above. I want to change the blue background to something lighter, and thus for readability I need to make the font black. However, it seems this cannot be set in the global fonts in the theme editor.

Any idea how I can modify the font color? I've looked through the stylesheet associated with the template (modern.css) but did not immediately find the solution. Thanks a million in advance.
